titleStmt.title: In die Innocencium sermo pro episcopo puerorum
titleStmt.author: Alcock, John, 1430-1500.
Catholic Church. Pope (1316-1334 : John XXII)

notesStmt.note: Place of publication supplied and publication date conjectured by STC; Wynkyn de Worde's mark on b5v.
"Sequunt[ur] indulgencie quas papa Ioha[n]nes. xxij. concessit omnibus vere confessis et contritis ..", B4v-5v.
The last leaf bears a crucifixion scene.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
